entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Amherst
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:11 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 16.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Blowing snow over exposed areas this evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight then becoming light before morning. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
